articles.title: Endangered pygmy hippo calf Haggis born at Edinburgh zoo - BBC.com
articles.description: Pygmy hippos are native to West Africa and experts believe there are only about 2,500 left in the wild.
articles.content:
An "incredibly rare" female baby hippopotamus has been born at Edinburgh Zoo. 
The tiny endangered pygmy hippo calf, named Haggis, arrived on 30 October and zookeepers said her personality was "begi… [+1486 chars]
